name: dekkai
description: Modern and fast, really fast, CSV parser for the browser and node.js
author: Dario Segura

scripts.docs: documentation build src/** -f md -o README.md --markdown-toc false
scripts.wasm: emcc src/wasm/src/*.c -O3 -s WASM=1 -o src/wasm/bin/Parser.wasm -s TOTAL_MEMORY=1048576 -s TOTAL_STACK=0 -s WASM_MEM_MAX=1073741824 && wasm2wat src/wasm/bin/Parser.wasm -o src/wasm/bin/Parser.wat
